Burrito.title: Burrito with chicken
Burrito.description: chicken on a plate, tortilla cake, rice, peppers on a plate, onion on a plate, red beans, mushrooms, corn with spices, tomatoes, olives, iceberg, yellow cheese, cream sauce, mayonnaise sauce or hot salad

Burrito.title: Burrito with beef roast
Burrito.description: veal or minced meat (specify), tortilla bread, rice, plate peppers, onion, red beans, mushrooms, corn with spices, tomatoes, iceberg, olives, yellow cheese, cream sauce, mayonnaise sauce, or hot spit at will

Burrito.title: Burrito with pork
Burrito.description: pork roast, tortilla bread, rice, plate peppers, plate onion, red beans, mushrooms, spicy corn, tomatoes, iceberg, olives, yellow cheese, cream sauce, mayonnaise sauce or hot salad, if desired

Quesadilla.title: Quesadilla with chicken
Quesadilla.description: Cassadia with chicken - large chicken on a plate, 2 pieces of tortillas, plate peppers, mushrooms, beans, corn with spices, tomatoes, iceberg, cheese, olives, cream sauce, mayonnaise sauce or hot salad on desire

Quesadilla.title: Quesadilla with veal
Quesadilla.description: beef roast or minced meat, 2 pieces of tortilla tortilla, plate peppers, mushrooms, beans, corn with spices, tomatoes, iceberg, cheese, olives, cream sauce, mayonnaise sauce or hot salad

Quesadilla.title: Vegetarian Quesadilla

Quesadilla.title: Quesadilla with Pork
Quesadilla.description: pork roast, 2 tortilla tortillas, plate peppers, mushrooms, beans, corn with spices, tomatoes, iceberg, yellow cheese, olives, cream sauce, mayonnaise sauce or hot salad
